website_summaries.verdict: A comfortably priced inflatable floating island that can seat up to 5 people.
pros: Intex's Blue Tropical Island features a built-in cooler and 4 cup holders for your beverages
The mesh bottom can help cool you off on hot days while the handles facilitate getting on and off of the island
cons: You need to set some time aside for deflating as the nozzles do not let the air out very fast

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and Durable
customer_reviews.text: For a family of five that travel around to springs a lot this float made things much easier. We all were able to fit on the float without the hassle of having our children carry their floats and not getting caught up with string trying to stay together. The only con about this float is the deflation. Should have more nozzles to release air. Takes time to get the air out.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy

customer_reviews.title: Very big
customer_reviews.text: It is spacious and we were comfortable floating on the river. We had hard time carrying it because there is no handels all around (only two on one side) and no rope all around, so we had nothing to grab to. Also it didn’t stay inflated properly not even 24 hours. The inside of the cooler part is not insulated at all so water of the cold river just melted our ice in 10 minutes. The cup holders do not hold bottles, only cans which is veird and everyone on the raft had bottles. We did like having mash floor and we did like all the space and back support.
customer_reviews.author: Viktoria

customer_reviews.title: Seam unglued wont hold air
customer_reviews.text: No idea how great it is because it came with a seam that wasnt attached. As we went to inflate, air just pours out. So much money wasted 😢 kids were so beyond disappointed that our plans we had for 6 months were busted due to this float being poorly constructed. Such a shame!
customer_reviews.author: Tera Gill

customer_reviews.title: Very durable and picture is true to size - fits 5 people comfortably
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend this very durable raft. We kept the raft docked on a lake over night when not in use and it stayed inflated for days (without needing to reinflate). We used an air compressor to inflate.
customer_reviews.author: B Blatt

customer_reviews.title: SO MUCH FUN
customer_reviews.text: LOVE IT!!!!! The access to cool off in the bottom is my favorite feature. Used on a river and tied off using one of the four handles to the pier. never added air during two days of use. Did pull it out of water in evenings and only needed two people to do so.
customer_reviews.author: LLB

customer_reviews.title: Nice sundeck layout area
customer_reviews.text: Family had a great time on this float in the lake in our backyard. Held up much better than the flamingo last year. Only issue is the darker color vinyls stretch out causing large bubbles due to time in the sun, whereas the white and areas with minimal color do not. This caused the the backrest of the sundeck side to deform. Keep in mind, we keep it inflated and in the water for several weeks at a time, so the ordinary user may not experience the same issue.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: Fun for the summer
customer_reviews.text: We took this to the river and floated down the river with it and was a great time. The netting in the middle allows you to keep your feet cool. We only had 3 people on it but I believe we could’ve had 5-6 people on it. I also was able to stand on the netting in the middle and it held me and I weigh around 155. Overall I enjoyed this product and will be using it next summer as well.
customer_reviews.author: Chris F

customer_reviews.title: Tough, durable & fun
customer_reviews.text: I bought this island float when COVID cancelled my kids' summer camps. I put it in a shallow bay next to our house. The kids love it as they can have several friends while maintaining safe distances. It's also very tough and durable as it's survived several squalls with 3-4 waves and it even caught air and flew like a kite. It's still going. Only maintenance has been scrapping off the barnacles underneath!
customer_reviews.author: Oscar C.

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Great fun!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and fun! Used it five times in Salt river, AZ (usually four adults). The only problem that I had with it is that some of the blue color washed away in the first use. If you buy it, make sure to buy a reliable air pump and good oars.
customer_reviews.author: Tal Yaniv

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun in the Sun!
customer_reviews.text: we liked our first one so much three years ago that we bought a second one this year they're fantastic lots of family fun!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor design. Used it twice.
customer_reviews.text: The mesh netting ripped from a small boy which then put a hole in the seam. We patched it but still leaked air. We had to remove the mesh netting which then made it so you couldn't really sit in the seat parts because it felt like you were going to slide into the water. I got to use it 2 times before it was useless.
customer_reviews.author: Hope Walker

customer_reviews.title: Poor Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: Purchased in December 2019. Waited for summer and used raft 2 times and the floor tore at the seam for what looks to be a manufacturing defect. VM Express the seller told me I only had 30 days to return. It was still in the box for 7 months. I sent pictures which clearly showed the manufacturing defect. VM Express did not seem to care. Do not purchase from them. They do not stand behind what they sell.
customer_reviews.author: JBoss

customer_reviews.title: It does not inflate all the way...
customer_reviews.text: Please do not waste your money on this item. The instructions state to blow up each “labeled” bladder in numerical order. There absolutely no labeled bladders, pieces, sections.... no labeled anything. We spent 4 hours (we have an air compressor that can easily blow up anything) we were never able to blow it up more than half way. I wanted this so badly I went past the 30 day return time trying to get it blown up. Now I’m out $200 for a giant piece of plastic. Pay attention to the return policy if you order this product and can’t inflate it.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Best for the money I’m buying another
customer_reviews.text: For the price it was amazing it lasted the 3 days at the lake in which I had to deflate and inflate each time. It fit 5 ppl comfortably including my 1.5 year old so 5 1/2 ppl all together. Gets tight after that. My son loved the mesh in the middle little play area very strong. I will buy again due to ripping a hole in the seem from sharp metal in my garage (my fault)
customer_reviews.author: ruben serrato

customer_reviews.title: Lasted a whole summer + a Week of vacation
customer_reviews.text: This was awesome on the lake, we have blown it up and deflated it many times with no issues. We left it blown up on the lake for a week with no issues. Can be hard to get into- but you get the hang of it. Completely worth it & wouldn't hesitate to buy another if needed.
customer_reviews.author: TReny

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Float
customer_reviews.text: Love it!!! It’s super comfy and love that you can sit or lay on it and sun. The middle is netted and is great for cooling your feet and legs! Love the attached cooler to keep extra drinks on hand! We tied it to the dick and just floated, it was great!! Highly recommended!!
customer_reviews.author: Lexro

customer_reviews.title: Great Time
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this item for a group camping trip. At one time we had 7 adults on it and they had a great time!
customer_reviews.author: Julie Stephens

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: Took a while to fill due to size but it was a blast on the lake. The cooler does not work though. The ice melted in fifteen minutes and our drinks were warm. Not major just an FYI for others.
customer_reviews.author: wendy

customer_reviews.title: No complaints
customer_reviews.text: I saw some of the reviews mention they were not happy with the raft... I took a chance b/c I wanted it in time for the 4th. I've used it a few times and it works great... so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Andy B. Wilt

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy This!
customer_reviews.text: Product sat in garage for 31 days before we used it. The first time we used it it did not hold air. The company would not replace unit because their we missed their guarantee by 1 day. Not happy! and will never use them again. Buyer be aware!
customer_reviews.author: kcinmd

customer_reviews.title: Great for float trips!
customer_reviews.text: This is the bomb! Its durable enough to last us all day on a shallow river. It never ripped to got torn, the beer stayed cold in the cooler, and was super comfortable. Only wish there was more room for coolers.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Bone

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome we loved it but it did have an issue after a few uses , but company refunded us quickly!
customer_reviews.author: Nickfury33

customer_reviews.title: Loads of fun
customer_reviews.text: This was lots of fun to use on our vacation. A small battery powered pump was used to inflate it fairly easily.
customer_reviews.author: Tina F

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Hasn't been warm enough to try it yet but can't wait to get it on the lake. Will do another review once we try it out
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great item!
customer_reviews.text: It's great! Takes about 30 min for set up but it works amazing. Easy to get in and out of. Would reccomend buying an anchor or at least a rope to the off with
customer_reviews.author: ginga

customer_reviews.title: Great for adults and kids!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to use for a graduation party in the river. The kids were off and on and at some point the moms took over and we sat on it and enjoyed the peace! I think 3 of the parents purchased one when they left!
customer_reviews.author: Dean R.

customer_reviews.title: SO MUCH FUN
customer_reviews.text: Love this float! Very large and roomy with lots of space to sunbathe.
customer_reviews.author: Marjorie Stern

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: spent a week housboating and this was a fan favorite.
customer_reviews.author: michelle connolly

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Awesome best thing to float down a river in we had a 2 year old and he loved it. We floated for 5 hours and he was never bored and had a blast!!!
customer_reviews.author: Christy

customer_reviews.title: It had a hole
customer_reviews.text: The reason I gave this five stars is that even though we almost sunk, the company was no problem returning it
customer_reviews.author: MsBooksmart

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed in this product...a family member accidentally stumbled and put pressure on the center mesh and it tore immediately. Despite attempts to patch and repair..unsuccessful. odd place to put mesh in the first place. Spent a lot of money for this product.
customer_reviews.author: Bob and Terri

customer_reviews.title: LOVED IT!
customer_reviews.text: Bought and used during a week long vacation at the lake. Was awesome! Very comfortable and loved the netted bottom for your feet. Took some time to blow up which was expected and deflating was easy. Would highly recommend. Can't wait to go back to the lake and use it again!
customer_reviews.author: Cathy L Cottingham

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase! Amazing value. Used this for a week at a lake. We had up to 7 or 8 people on it comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: Marcie

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the 5 Sean Inflatable For a river trip that we took. We blew it up secured it take it out to the river anchored it to the beach and within an hour and a half it started losing the air I was a little disappointed. This was not cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Mercedes Martin

customer_reviews.title: Mini Islnd I cant get voted off of
customer_reviews.text: Awesome present for my grandson. We are having a blast on it.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Crowell

customer_reviews.title: Mesh center to cool feet in.
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and the ability to soak your feet in the center with mesh is wonderful. My sister even sat in it. Used an umbrella as shade and kayak oars to paddle. A fun and green way to hang on a lake.
customer_reviews.author: Regina Velez

customer_reviews.title: Not durable, not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Used once on the river. Big holes after one use. Does not even come with patch kit. Do not buy
customer_reviews.author: carrin

customer_reviews.title: Great deal!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Loved how big it was. Never lost any air in the 7 hours we had it on the lake.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Relaxation Station Rocks!
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a bday gift for my husband. So much fun!! A little cumbersome to inflate but totally worth it. Many onlookers commented at how cool it looked.
customer_reviews.author: Diane U.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't stay inflated
customer_reviews.text: I'd love it more if the outter sections stayed inflated. It doesn't last longer than 2hrs. I asked for an exchange but haven't gotten a reply from the seller.
customer_reviews.author: melissa

customer_reviews.title: If there is a leak in float forget getting another one or a replacement
customer_reviews.text: Product was great but unfortunately It had a leak in the seam , weight is about 50lbs and I would have to pay to return, don’t waste your moneys
customer_reviews.author: deborah dreyfous

customer_reviews.title: Excellent buy for summer fun!
customer_reviews.text: Durable! Love the middle section that allows water in to cool you off. Had many good times with friends and family on this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Senior population need a ladder 😉
customer_reviews.text: Really like the big open mesh center, we used in as a "kiddy pool" while floating in a lake.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Waiting for a reply.
customer_reviews.text: It deflated within a couple of hours. Waiting to hear back from the seller.
customer_reviews.author: MJ Lowry

product_meta.title: Intex 57272EP Adult 5 Seat Inflatable Tropical Island Lounging Pool Float, Blue
product_meta.description: Load up your family and friends on the Intex Blue Tropical Island Floating Raft and prepare to have a totally tubular day on the lake. Your pals will love cracking open a few cold drinks on this raft as you float on the water. They can store their drinks in the cup holders, or even in the built-in cooler if they want them to stay extra chill! Plus, if they can stay cool without even getting in the water thanks to the mesh floor netting. Float out and relax for the day with the Intex Blue Tropical Island Floating Raft.
feature_bullets: Island floating lounge allows you to relax by yourself or with others out on the pond, lake, pool, or ocean
Built in cooler lets you keep drinks nice and cool even as the day gets hotter
Adult inflatable raft comfortable fits up to 5 people
Mesh netting on the floor allows for you to keep your feet cool even on a hot day
4 cup holders allow your family and friends to never go thirsty

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars162 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
